hotels.name: Rosewood Schloss Fuschl
hotels.desc: Lakeside luxury resort, See Club day passes, seasonal cocktails and cuisine
hotels.longDesc: A sun-drenched lakeside resort where afternoon leisure transforms into warm evenings by the water, featuring the newly opened See Club with fresh cocktails and seasonal light dishes on the deck.

hotels.name: Forsthofgut
hotels.desc: Alpine nature hotel, summer retreat, Austrian Alps, seasonal beauty
hotels.longDesc: A nature-focused alpine hotel in Austria's scenic landscape, celebrated for its summer transformation and immersive mountain experience.

hotels.name: Sonnwies Family Resort
hotels.desc: Kids hotel specifically designed for families, in a league of its own
hotels.longDesc: A specialized family resort designed exclusively for children, offering dedicated amenities and experiences tailored to kid-friendly hospitality.
hotels.address: Via Alter Rungger, 20, 39040 Luson BZ, Italy

hotels.name: Natur Hotel Forsthofgut
hotels.desc: Nature-focused alpine hotel, mountain design, sustainable luxury retreat
hotels.longDesc: An environmentally conscious luxury alpine hotel offering design-forward accommodations with emphasis on natural surroundings and mountain wellness experiences.

hotels.name: Familienresort Moargut
hotels.desc: Family resort with 6m indoor trampoline hall, multiple jump fields, window jump, airbag, action-packed
hotels.longDesc: A family-focused alpine resort featuring a 6-meter high indoor trampoline hall with varied jump fields, window-jump feature, and 1.5-meter airbag dropsâ€”perfect for teens seeking adventure during a mountain vacation.

hotels.name: Hotel Goldener Hirsch, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Salzburg
hotels.desc: Luxury five-star hotel, historic elegance, perfect for family celebrations
hotels.longDesc: A legendary luxury hotel in Salzburg's old town, offering timeless elegance and world-class service. Perfect for families seeking sophisticated comfort with proximity to Mozart's birthplace and charming cobblestone streets.
hotels.photoAttribution: Hotel Goldener Hirsch, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Salzburg

restaurants.name: See Club
restaurants.desc: Lakeside day club, seasonal cocktails, fresh cuisine, deck dining
restaurants.longDesc: A waterfront day club offering cool swims, fresh cocktails, and light seasonal dishes served on a sun-drenched deck, perfect for escaping to the lakeside.

restaurants.name: Schloss Restaurant
restaurants.desc: Gourmet dining within historic castle, fine Austrian cuisine, Alpine views
restaurants.longDesc: An elegant gourmet restaurant located within the historic Rosewood Schloss Fuschl castle, offering refined Austrian cuisine with stunning lake and mountain vistas.

restaurants.name: NATUR BRAUEREI ALMTAL GmbH
restaurants.desc: Traditional brewery restaurant, hearty Austrian cuisine, family-friendly atmosphere
restaurants.longDesc: A charming countryside brewery restaurant serving authentic Austrian specialties and fresh-brewed beer. Families love the relaxed Alpine setting, generous portions, and beautiful outdoor garden perfect for children.

restaurants.desc: Historic Viennese coffeehouse, traditional Sachertorte, cozy intimate ambiance
restaurants.longDesc: A beloved Viennese institution since 1880, serving exceptional coffee and Austria's most famous chocolate cake. The elegant yet welcoming atmosphere makes it ideal for families wanting authentic Viennese cafÃ© culture.

experiences.name: Ehrwalder Mountain
experiences.desc: Alpine mountain peak, cable car access, skiing, hiking and biking destination, 1,500m elevation
experiences.longDesc: A prominent Tyrolean Alps peak accessible via cable car, long favored by winter sports enthusiasts and warm-season hikers and mountain bikers seeking alpine adventure.

experiences.name: Asaya Spa
experiences.desc: 16,000-sq-ft luxury spa, infinity pools, saunas, wellness retreat
experiences.longDesc: An expansive wellness sanctuary spanning 16,000 square feet featuring infinity pools, saunas, and comprehensive spa treatments in a serene Alpine lakeside setting.

experiences.name: Hallstatt
experiences.desc: Lakeside village nestled between mountains, magical winter vibes, peaceful and picturesque
experiences.longDesc: A charming Alpine village tucked between mountains and HallstÃ¤tter See lake, offering magical scenery and peaceful wandering opportunities year-round.

experiences.name: HallstÃ¤tter See
experiences.desc: Alpine lake offering stunning mountain views and peaceful winter scenery
experiences.longDesc: A pristine Alpine lake that frames the picturesque village of Hallstatt with dramatic mountain vistas and serene natural beauty.

experiences.name: Krimml Waterfalls
experiences.desc: Europe's highest waterfall, three-stage cascade, scenic hiking trails for all abilities
experiences.longDesc: Austria's most spectacular waterfall system drops 380 meters through enchanting Alpine landscape. Family-friendly trails of varying difficulty lead past misty cascades, offering breathtaking photography and nature immersion.

experiences.name: Mirabell Palace
experiences.desc: Baroque palace with famous gardens, perfect for kids to run around

experiences.name: Mozart's Birthplace
experiences.desc: Historic birthplace museum, keep it brief with young kids

experiences.name: Aussicht Festung Hohensalzburg
experiences.desc: Take funicular up for panoramic views, explore briefly with toddlers

kidFriendly.name: Elternkindbegleitung
kidFriendly.desc: Family-focused activity center, ages 3-8, parent-child programs and creative exploration
kidFriendly.longDesc: A Vienna-based family center offering parent-child accompanied activities and creative exploration for children aged 3-8, allowing parents to enjoy the city.
kidFriendly.photoAttribution: Eltern Kind Begleitung- Spielraum / Kindergeburtstag / BabycafÃ© / Summer Camp

kidFriendly.name: SchÃ¶nbrunn Zoo
kidFriendly.desc: World's oldest zoo, 700+ animals, enchanting palace grounds for exploration
kidFriendly.longDesc: Located within the stunning SchÃ¶nbrunn Palace grounds, this historic zoo captivates children with exotic animals, interactive zones, and beautiful gardens. A perfect full-day family adventure combining wildlife and imperial grandeur.

kidFriendly.name: Salzwelten Salzburg
kidFriendly.desc: Interactive salt mine with slides and underground train, perfect for ages 2-6

kidFriendly.name: Salzburg Puppet theatre
kidFriendly.desc: World-famous puppet theater with enchanting performances for children

markets.name: Hallstatt Christmas Market
markets.desc: Exclusive annual Christmas market held just one day per year
markets.longDesc: A highly anticipated seasonal market that operates for only one day annually, creating a unique and exclusive festive experience in this magical village.

markets.name: Naschmarkt
markets.desc: Vibrant food market, 100+ vendors, exotic spices, fresh produce, local treasures
markets.longDesc: Vienna's most famous market buzzes with colors, aromas, and flavors from around the world. Perfect for families to sample local Austrian products, exotic foods, and traditional snacks while exploring the lively neighborhood.

a.name: Alpine Lakes & Castle Dreams (8 Days)
a.description: A perfectly paced family adventure through Austria's fairy-tale landscapes, from lakeside castles to mountain resorts, designed for little explorers and their parents.
